text: Derek Boogaard (June 23, 1982 – May 13, 2011) was a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger. He played for 6 seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL) for the Minnesota Wild and New York Rangers. He was known for being an enforcer and for his physical play, this gained him the nicknames, "Boogeyman" and "The Mountie". He was found dead in his Minneapolis apartment on May 13, 2011. He was only 28 years old. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Belak had been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1982 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey left wingers Category:Drug-related accidental deaths Category:Houston Aeros (1994–2013) players Category:Ice hockey people from Saskatchewan Category:Medicine Hat Tigers players Category:Minnesota Wild players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from Saskatoon Category:Prince George Cougars players Category:Regina Pats players Category:ECHL players
title: Derek Boogaard
